abstract: HSBC is in advanced talks with China’s Industrial Securities to create an investment banking venture, Reuters said, citing a report from Hong Kong’s Apple Daily.
snippet: HSBC is in advanced talks with China’s Industrial Securities to create an investment banking venture, Reuters said, citing a report from Hong Kong’s Apple Daily.
lead_paragraph: HSBC is in advanced talks with China’s Industrial Securities to create an investment banking venture, Reuters said, citing a report from Hong Kong’s Apple Daily.

headline.main: HSBC May Be in Talks for Hong Kong Banking Venture

abstract: Some fans of that AMC drama discovered on Tuesday that they were briefly able to download the third episode of the new season from the Apple iTunes store, nearly two weeks before the episode is scheduled to be broadcast on television.
snippet: Some fans of that AMC drama discovered on Tuesday that they were briefly able to download the third episode of the new season from the Apple iTunes store, nearly two weeks before the episode is scheduled to be broadcast on television.
lead_paragraph: Having waited nearly a year for the new season of “Mad Men” to have its premiere last Sunday, some fans of that AMC drama discovered on Tuesday that they were briefly able to download the third episode of the new season from the Apple iTunes store, nearly two weeks before the episode is scheduled to be broadcast on television.

headline.main: ‘Mad Men’ Episode Accidentally Turns Up Early on iTunes
